events.message: The applicant has completed and submitted the auto loan application for a new car purchase, signaling the formal start of the process.
Application has been classified under Auto Loan category as the loan is intended for purchasing a vehicle specifically a car.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to the application to oversee and guide the applicant through the auto loan process.
The initial review of the application documents and provided information is underway to verify eligibility and completeness.
Additional documents such as proof of income, identification, and vehicle details have been requested from the applicant.
The applicant has successfully uploaded all required documents including income statements and identification proofs.
The credit check process has been completed showing a satisfactory credit history supporting the loan application.
Risk assessment has been finalized balancing applicant's creditworthiness and vehicle valuation to decide loan feasibility.
A loan offer including interest rates, repayment terms, and vehicle details has been presented to the applicant for review.
The applicant has responded positively accepting the terms of the offer and requested a few clarifications about payment schedules.
Due to applicant's queries and some verification needs, the application has been escalated to the senior loan committee for further review.
The senior loan committee has approved the auto loan application after carefully considering all applicant details and risk factors.
The approved loan amount has been successfully disbursed to the applicant’s account for car purchase completion.
Follow-up communication has been established to ensure that the applicant is satisfied and all loan conditions are being met.
The loan application case has been formally closed after confirmation of funding and applicant’s acknowledgment of terms.
